query='Describe the process and key strategies Felipe Aros employed in the development of the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system at Digitaltex. Include details on how he ensured the precision of the system and the role of benchmarking in optimizing its performance.' contexts=['Felipe Aros
Santiago, Chile |569-98254228 |felipe.aros.r@gmail.com |github.com/felipearosr
Professional Summary
Results-driven professional with expertise in Machine Learning Engineering and Software Development. Proven track record
in designing and implementing high-precision Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems, optimizing performance through
rigorous benchmarking. Experienced in engineering web applications and leading AI research projects with successful in-
ternational collaboration. Seeking opportunities to leverage skills in machine learning, software development, and project
leadership for innovative solutions and client satisfaction.
Experience
Generative AI - RAG Systems December 2022 – Present
Digitaltex Santiago, Chile
•Led the development of an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for a prominent client, utilizing
a diverse dataset of over 100 documents to ensure unparalleled precision in information retrieval.
•Demonstrated expertise in grounding large language models (LLMs) on accurate and up-to-date information, sur-
passing client expectations and delivering a highly accurate RAG system.
•Conducted rigorous benchmarking of multiple RAG system iterations, systematically analyzing and comparing per-
formance metrics to optimize efficiency and effectiveness.
•Fostered transparent collaboration with the client throughout the development and benchmarking phases, resulting
in a technically superior RAG system tailored to meet specific needs and expectations.
Machine Learning Engineer June 2022 – December 2022
Gecko Santiago, Chile
•Engineered a web application utilizing an in house ML model to accurately identify and mark road signs in images,
capturing their position, type, and direction.
•Implemented website optimization strategies to enhance overall user experience and performance.
•Executed responsive design principles across the entire web application, ensuring seamless usability across various
devices.
Customer Data Platform (CDP) Development Manager July 2021 – June 2022
Eureka Labs Santiago, Chile
•Led a team in the development and research of Customer Data Platform (CDP) tools, collaborating with international
providers for their implementation in national trade.
•Effectively communicated with software providers worldwide, fostering collaboration with teams from the United
States, Poland, and India.
•Managed and implemented new applications, contributing to improved documentation processes.
•Executed the implementation of diverse CDP services in various e-commerce settings.
Education
Universidad Diego Portales Santiago, Chile
Civil Engineering in Computer Science and Telecommunications Jan. 2018 – Dec. 2023
42 Silicon Valley San Francisco, USA
Study abroad in Computer Science Aug. 2014 – May 2018
Technical Skills
Languages : Python, Java, C/C++, SQL (Postgres), JavaScript, HTML/CSS
Frameworks : React, Node.js, Flask, FastAPI
Developer Tools : Git, Docker, TravisCI, Google Cloud Platform, VS Code, Visual Studio, PyCharm, IntelliJ, Eclipse
Libraries : pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib
Language Proficiency
Spanish : Native
English : Advanced (C1)'] response="Felipe Aros led the development of an advanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system at Digitaltex, focusing on delivering a solution with unparalleled precision in information retrieval. The process began with the utilization of a diverse dataset comprising over 100 documents. This extensive dataset was instrumental in grounding large language models (LLMs) on accurate and up-to-date information, which was a critical factor in surpassing client expectations and delivering a highly accurate RAG system.

To ensure the precision of the system, Aros demonstrated expertise in grounding LLMs, a technique essential for ensuring that the generated outputs were based on factual and current information. This approach was pivotal in achieving a RAG system that could reliably retrieve and generate information with high accuracy.

Benchmarking played a crucial role in optimizing the performance of the RAG system. Aros conducted rigorous benchmarking of multiple iterations of the RAG system, systematically analyzing and comparing performance metrics. This methodical approach allowed for the identification of areas for improvement, enabling the team to make informed decisions on how to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. Through this process, Aros and his team were able to refine the system iteratively, ensuring that each version was an improvement over the last.

Throughout the development and benchmarking phases, Aros fostered transparent collaboration with the client. This open communication ensured that the development process was aligned with the client's specific needs and expectations, resulting in a technically superior RAG system tailored to meet those requirements." passing=True feedback='YES' score=1.0 pairwise_source=None invalid_result=False invalid_reason=None

English : Advanced (C1)'] response="Felipe Aros's study abroad experience at 42 Silicon Valley likely played a significant role in shaping his expertise in Machine Learning Engineering and Software Development, as well as enhancing his project leadership abilities. The immersive learning environment at 42 Silicon Valley, known for its innovative and hands-on approach to education in technology fields, would have provided him with a solid foundation in computer science principles and practical skills in software development. This experience would have exposed him to cutting-edge technologies and methodologies in the tech industry, fostering a deep understanding of machine learning concepts and their applications.

The project-based and peer-learning pedagogy at 42 Silicon Valley would have also honed his problem-solving skills, adaptability, and ability to work collaboratively on complex projects.
